name: bone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 any of the hard parts inside a human or animal that make up its frame: The child was so thin that you could see her bones. human/animal bones
SCIEPRO/Science Photo Library/GettyImages
B1 the bone in meat or fish: There's still a lot of meat left on the bone - shall I slice some off for you? I don't like fish because I hate the bones.
More examplesFewer examplesA fish bone got stuck in my throat.He's broken a bone in his wrist.Doctors have replaced the top of his hip bone with a metal sphere.The soldiers discovered a pile of human skulls and bones.Doctors inserted a metal pin in his leg to hold the bones together.
